pullrequest.title: Radial menu and delete models (touch only)

content.raw: I find that when I press a model the camera rotates a little bit first before as my finger slowly settles to a fixed position. This cancels the long press and does not trigger the radial menu any more. Is it possible to just restart the long press timer and not cancel the action?
content.html: I find that when I press a model the camera rotates a little bit first before as my finger slowly settles to a fixed position. This cancels the long press and does not trigger the radial menu any more. Is it possible to just restart the long press timer and not cancel the action?
